website_summaries.verdict: A challenging airplane model kit for hobbyists and more skilled model builders.
pros: The individual parts are precisely cut for the best possible fit when assembling everything
Comes with highly-detailed components that are easy to paint
cons: The balsa wood and plastic ribbing can easily flex and bend out of shape to the point of breaking

customer_reviews.title: My youth has returned
customer_reviews.text: I built Guillow's airplane kits as a young boy and just recently rediscovered them. Just as fun to build now as it was then. Everything goes together very well and the instructions are easy to follow. Might convert it to electric at a later date but for now it is under rubber motor power and a static display.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: The stringers are weak
customer_reviews.text: I've been having problems with the stringers breaking when trying to sand any part. Just picking it up is a problem also. All the other parts are great and the laser cuts are great. I looked around for stringers but they are (the least expensive are 1.19 each) some as high as 1.99. I've used other Guillow's kits and not had this happen. I just finished a F4U-4 Corsair with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: awesome kid!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this kit exceeded all my expectations and I am having a ball building it. Brings back a lot of childhood memories when I built my first stick and tissue model. Construction is well underway
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: You will need a 23”x36” or bigger layout board
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! I just opened it and it is bitchin! I have put more than one together so this should come out nice. BIGGER INSTRUCTIONS MAKE IT BETTER. More details too! I will be back when it’s finished! UPDATE: I have made mods to mine and I took away 1 ⭐️ because the 1/16” stringers are AWFUL. THEY ARE TOO THIN AND VULNERABLE. Out of all the ones provided only maybe 9 are worth a shit. Be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Don’t tread on me and Boo

customer_reviews.title: beautiful kit
customer_reviews.text: been working on this model and enjoying it very much..i am an amature at this but instructions seem good and taking my time seems to be working well..will build more if I can complete this project....great pastime for retirement days....highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: RayJay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality kit....lots of fun to build.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few years since I built this kind of kit. The quality of the kit was excellent. I would say however that you should have some experience with balsa stick kits or it could be quite challenging. I had a blast building mine and would highly recommend Guillow's kits.
customer_reviews.author: gldwng

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!!
customer_reviews.text: As usual. Everything you need. Same kits ive been building for 30 years. Quality is top notch. The parts are being laser cut now and that makes it a pleasure to build. I will ONLY buy Guillows kits.
customer_reviews.author: Tony H

customer_reviews.title: Great Plane to build
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend building one of the smaller Guillows models first, before attempting this one. Cessna or something like that. I have built 2 of the p-51's and they both turned out very nice for hanging in a bedroom or living room. Good week or so project build.
customer_reviews.author: Jay J.

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great and parts are crisp
customer_reviews.text: First Balsa kit. Turned out great and parts are crisp. Made the mistake of buying the spirit of STL next and opened the box. Yikes!!! The largest amount of work is just salvaging the parts that were “pressed” out.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty W. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed Building
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed building this model. For the price these models are excellent for learning technic for new modelers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great kit.....everything about this kits exactly what you would imagine..
customer_reviews.author: KYBIKER

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 57 and havn't built a balsa plane since I was a kid. I loved the laser cut, parts fit perfectly, I'm 90% done and trying to decide which one to start next. What a great alternative to TV! Great plane, great fun, What more can you ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight S. Tabb

customer_reviews.title: Another great Guillow’s kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the laser cut pieces. Easy to follow directions. Good illustrations. Fun the build. A bit challenging if you are a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Great model, great fun, build it carefully!
customer_reviews.text: The model kit is complete in every regard! My grandson and I enjoyed working together to build a realistic and pleasing replica of the P51 Mustang. The key to success is to become thoroughly familiar with the clear plan and extensive instructions before beginning the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Mariani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great plane with awesome lazer cut parts, with over 40 yrs building experience this kit is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Build memories and dreams!
customer_reviews.text: Guillows engineers amazing kits, and this is no exception. Balsa flies better! Spend some time around the kitchen table with the kids building memories and dreams! These make beautiful display or flying models.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alway had good results with Gillows products. I recmmend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the laser cut, makes a lot neater model.
customer_reviews.author: L Lauris

customer_reviews.title: First laser cut model!
customer_reviews.text: Just started the model, laser cut is so much better than die cut, everything is so smooth and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: FLHTCMAN

customer_reviews.title: Watch carefully before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a smaller version of the model. The high price I was quoted made me sure it was for the larger model. I will be returning this thing once I get it and ask for a refund. The price was way too high and out of line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Like the Old Days... Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I bought this for my 92 year old dad and it's like he's back in his prime. It is in the mode of the original wooden models. It is capable of flight.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DelGaudio

customer_reviews.title: Take your time to build kit
customer_reviews.text: I have been building models like Boats,Airplanes, and Cars ,Rockets for many many years so this was easy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young ones
customer_reviews.text: Great project for our 12 year old grandson. He enjoys assembling them
customer_reviews.author: Dandyroo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laser cut model parts..much easier to remove and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Wood
customer_reviews.text: A gift to someone I gave happy to see they still offer the wood version.
customer_reviews.author: marlene czarkowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing, enjoyed building progress so much! Converted this kit to electric rc plane, flies great!
customer_reviews.author: Zhipeng

customer_reviews.title: Laser cut models are the best.
customer_reviews.text: The laser cut parts in this kit are much easier to remove and assemble than the older die cut parts. One problem I had was with the plastic landing gear rib. Guillow should return to using the wooden ply ribs for strength and lack of being softened by the heat from applying Monokote and glue in assemble. I had to cut out the plastic landing gear rib and replace it with a wooden one after assembly because it became soft. Otherwise the kit was great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Tuskegee P-51 Mustang
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, you have to modified the single propeller with a four blade propeller to make it more realistic to the WWII Mustangs.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Tayloe

customer_reviews.title: but looks inviting and I like the laser cut pieces
customer_reviews.text: I haven't started it yet, but looks inviting and I like the laser cut pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Don Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: what's perfect easy to follow directions was put together beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Jim N.

customer_reviews.title: Like the laser cut on the pieces
customer_reviews.text: Like the laser cut on the pieces; & like to work on them. Some pieces are very small is comment, too. Hard to work with. Satisfied with the model - not finished with it yet. Will get more. Tom
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kropp

customer_reviews.title: Was missing instructions and paper.
customer_reviews.text: Good model but too many missing things. it's hard to put this together without instructions and I had to buy the tissue paper to put on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary P Goldman

product_meta.title: Guillow's P51 Mustang Laser Cut Model Kit
product_meta.description:
The U. S. Air Force's P-52 Mustang has a 27.75" wingspan. The North American P-51 Mustang was probably the best all-around single-seat piston engine fighter to be used in World War 2. The first U.S.A.A.F. combat group arrived in Britain in November 1943 and from then until the end of the war, the P-51 earned an enviable reputation as a long-range fighter-escort for the B-17 and B-24 bombers raiding deep in the heart of the German homeland. • Precision laser cut balsa parts, scale WWI plastic wheels, full set of decals, vacuum formed plastic parts and all accessories needed • Perfect for rubber power, U-Control and free flight as well as for display • Complete instructions for building either to fly or for static display

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Guillow's is the recognized leader in quality scale balsa model airplane kits. Our model construction kits are the last word in scale realism for the super detail fan and light weight for those who build and fly. Each model is a small but faithful replica of an airplane widely known for deeds in wartime or present day popularity. Series 400 features 3/4" scale models of iconic military aircraft from World War II, with precision laser-cut parts for easier assembly.
feature_bullets: The U. S. Air Force's P-52 Mustang has a 27.75" wingspan
Precision laser cut balsa parts, scale WWI plastic wheels, full set of decals, vacuum formed plastic parts and all accessories needed
Perfect for rubber power, U-Control and free flight as well as for display
Complete instructions for building either to fly or for static display
